metadata.title: Comprehensive Question Bank
metadata.description: A collection of various question types for assessments

questions.question: Name the object: ____
questions.svg_content:
<svg width="200" height="300" viewBox="0 0 200 300" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <rect x="50" y="60" width="100" height="180" fill="#81D4FA" stroke="#0288D1" stroke-width="2" />
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="60" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#4FC3F7" stroke="#0288D1" stroke-width="2"/>
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="240" rx="50" ry="20" fill="#4FC3F7" stroke="#0288D1" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

blanks.hint: Has two circular flat surfaces and one curved surface

feedback.none: Try again. It has circular ends and a curved surface.

questions.question: Name the object: ____
questions.svg_content:
<svg width="250" height="180" viewBox="0 0 250 180" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Front face -->
  <polygon points="60,80 60,140 160,140 160,80" fill="#FFCC80" stroke="#FB8C00" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Top face -->
  <polygon points="60,80 100,50 200,50 160,80" fill="#FFE082" stroke="#FB8C00" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Side face -->
  <polygon points="160,80 200,50 200,110 160,140" fill="#FFB74D" stroke="#FB8C00" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: top-back to bottom-back -->
  <line x1="200" y1="110" x2="100" y2="110" stroke="#EF6C00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: top-back to top-left -->
  <line x1="100" y1="50" x2="100" y2="110" stroke="#EF6C00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: bottom-back to bottom-left -->
  <line x1="100" y1="110" x2="60" y2="140" stroke="#EF6C00" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
</svg>

feedback.none: Try again. It looks like a box with rectangles on each face.

questions.question: Name the object: ____
questions.svg_content:
<svg width="200" height="200" viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Front face -->
  <polygon points="60,80 60,140 120,140 120,80" fill="#AED581" stroke="#558B2F" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Top face -->
  <polygon points="60,80 90,50 150,50 120,80" fill="#DCE775" stroke="#558B2F" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Side face -->
  <polygon points="120,80 150,50 150,110 120,140" fill="#9CCC65" stroke="#558B2F" stroke-width="2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: top-back to bottom-back -->
  <line x1="150" y1="110" x2="90" y2="110" stroke="#33691E" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: top-back to top-left -->
  <line x1="90" y1="50" x2="90" y2="110" stroke="#33691E" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
  <!-- Inner hidden edge: bottom-back to bottom-left -->
  <line x1="90" y1="110" x2="60" y2="140" stroke="#33691E" stroke-width="1" stroke-dasharray="4 2"/>
</svg>

feedback.none: Think of a dice shape with equal sides.

questions.question: Name the object: ____
questions.svg_content:
<svg width="200" height="250" viewBox="0 0 200 250" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="coneFill" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="1">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFCCBC"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FF7043"/>
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>

  <!-- Cone body (filled polygon) -->
  <path d="M50,200 A50,15 0 0,1 150,200 L100,50 Z" fill="url(#coneFill)" stroke="#D84315" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- Hidden (back) edge of base -->
  <path d="M50,200 A50,15 0 0,1 150,200" fill="none" stroke="#BF360C" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,3"/>

  <!-- Visible (front) edge of base -->
  <path d="M150,200 A50,15 0 0,1 50,200" fill="none" stroke="#BF360C" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

blanks.hint: Has a circular base and a pointed top

feedback.none: Try again. It has one curved surface and a circular base.

questions.question: Name the object: ____
questions.svg_content:
<svg width="200" height="200" viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="sphereGradient" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="60%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FFFFFF"/>
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#64B5F6"/>
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="100" cy="100" r="80" fill="url(#sphereGradient)" stroke="#1976D2" stroke-width="2"/>
</svg>

feedback.none: Try again. It looks like a 3D circle or a ball.
